content.prompt: Toward the end of the first paragraph, the references to what goes on “in one of the upstairs rooms” and to Jim Crenfew’s “explosive laugh” suggest which of the following about the narrator?

choices.label: He wishes to alter the past.
The past is very vivid to him.
He cannot tell reality from unreality.
He is interested in what will happen upstairs.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
